price: 119. Oo aad ku harraadeyn, qorrax kulkeedna kugu dhaceyn.
arabic: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظۡمَؤُاْ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضۡحَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-annaka lā taẓma-u fīhā walā taḍḥā
